Read more about the types of cases we often handle.

  • Medical Malpractice Naval Claims in Jacksonville, FL

moreBlocks.lawyersAtCronin&Maxwell,PLSelectedForASu: • Cronin, Sean B. On a Super Lawyers® List

moreBlocks.articles:
• Hospital Negligence
    If you suffered an injury because of the negligence of doctors, nurses or other hospital staff, contact our Jacksonville, Florida, law office for a free initial consultation.
  • Physician Negligence
    Physician negligence victims should not feel intimidated by the prospect of taking a military doctor to court.
  • Wrongful Death
    The death of a family member can be caused by a variety of medical mistakes. We handle wrongful death claims related to medical misconduct and military medical negligence.
  • Birth Injuries and Infant Death
    Birth injury cases require an extensive understanding of medical procedures and legal principles. Many things can go wrong during childbirth that can eventually lead to a birth injury like cerebral palsy or a brain injury.
  • Surgical Errors
    Surgical injuries are not always mere accidents. Sometimes surgical errors are caused by medical malpractice.

description:
THE LAW FIRM OF CRONIN & MAXWELL, PL

Jacksonville Lawyers for Medical Malpractice Cases

For more than 20 years, our law firm, Cronin & Maxwell, PL, has been helping clients in Florida pursue compensation for medical malpractice. From our centrally located offices in Jacksonville, we serve malpractice victims and families throughout northeast Florida.

Our firm is made up of two experienced trial attorneys, Sean B. Cronin and Gregory H. Maxwell, who are committed to providing personal attention to each of our clients. We have the experience and resources to take on substantial claims against powerful defendants.

Doing Whatever It Takes to Win Justice for Our Clients

It can take a great deal of hard work to achieve a fair outcome in a medical malpractice case. It is important to retain a law firm that will start that work right away, taking whatever steps are necessary to document your claim, protect your rights and pursue fair compensation.

If you have been injured, your condition has gotten worse or a loved one has died as a result of anything a doctor, hospital or other medical provider did or failed to do, we encourage you to contact us to discuss what we can do to help you obtain the results you deserve.

Call 904-302-6414 to Discuss How We Can Help You

At some law firms, you may never get to speak to a lawyer about your case. At our firm, if it appears that you may have a valid medical lawsuit, we will set up a meeting between you and one of our attorneys so you can get sound advice and carefully review your legal options.

We handle all malpractice cases on a contingency fee basis, meaning that you will not owe us any legal fees unless we help you obtain compensation. To discuss how our experienced attorneys can help you with your case, please contact us at 904-302-6414 or by e-mail.
